summary: Frontend UI redesign verification completed. All requested features implemented in code: Dashboard Quick Actions (Start Training, K9 Security, Virtual Pet, Competitions), Token Balance card with buy button, Share Progress button, Invite Friends referral banner, Interactive Training steps with practice timers, Lesson completion celebration modal with confetti and share button, Progress share cards, and Mobile bottom navigation. Fixed missing Checkbox import in TrainingCenter.jsx. Authentication required for dashboard access (Emergent Google OAuth).

fixed_issues.issue: Missing Checkbox import - would cause runtime error when user tries to complete training steps

share_progress_button.functionality: Uses Web Share API or clipboard fallback

lesson_completion_celebration.confetti_trigger: celebrate() function called on lesson completion

progress_share_card.location: Shows during in-progress lessons in TrainingCenter dialog

canvas_confetti.usage: Imported in InteractiveTraining.jsx, called via celebrate() function

critical_code_review_comments: TokenShop.jsx has React Hook useEffect missing dependency warning for 'checkPaymentStatus' - minor issue, not blocking functionality
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI redesign features all implemented. Dashboard has Quick Actions grid (Start Training, K9 Security, Virtual Pet, Competitions), token balance card, share progress card, and referral banner. Training Center uses interactive steps with practice timers and triggers confetti on lesson completion. Mobile bottom navigation shows on small screens. App requires Emergent Google OAuth for dashboard access. Fixed missing Checkbox import that would have caused runtime error.
